name: PMRL
description:
PMRL is a small, very basic roguelike I wrote for a talk on roguelike game development in Python at PyATL in October 2019.

It's not meant to be a good game, so YMMV.

Currently only distributed as an executable on Linux and Mac, but you can run it from source on Windows if you like.

On Linux or Mac, just download the archive, decompress, and run the pmrl executable.

Source: https://github.com/seansawyer/python-meetup-roguelike
